author: Home Repair Tutor
description: PEX tubing bracket installation tips…this PEX A moves too much. I used an adjustable HoldRite telescoping bracket and fastened it to the joists with 1 inch screws. Then I secured the PEX to the bracket with a universal clamp and #8 x 3/4 inch self-drilling screws. I use this setup every 32 inches for horizontal PEX tubing. Many thanks to HoldRite for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#plumbing #homerenovation #diy #holdritesolutions #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: PEX Tubing Bracket Installation Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
